channel.title: engine on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in engine on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Godot is so great
item.description: 14:02 Sunday 24 December 2017 Godot is super great for fast and easy development. I haven’t gotten to the export stage yet, but hopefully that will be as easy. I was able to add a queue to display the upcoming pieces in about an hour, including distractions. https://github.com/thunderrabbit/robdot_conswi to see the latest.
